men.headline: Lost 14 kg and finally seeing clear shape again.
men.quote: I had been thinking about GLP-1 medications, but the potential side effects and the idea of lifelong treatment scared me. Then I discovered a GLP-1 approach that works through the same mechanism naturally. In about 5 weeks, I lost around 14 kg and felt in control of my eating again.
men.author: Alex R., 39

women.headline: Lost around 16 kg and felt lighter, more energized, and less bloated.
women.quote: I had just over a month before my wedding and needed something that actually worked. I tried medication first but had to stop because of side effects. Then I switched to a GLP-1-focused eating approach and finally made real progress without medication.
women.author: Laura M., 42

infoBlocks.title: Why we calculate BMI
body: BMI helps us understand your weight range based on your height so we can better tailor your plan.

underweight.title: Your BMI is {{bmi}}, which falls below the typical range.
underweight.body: A good starting BMI for building a fit body.

overweight.title: Your BMI is {{bmi}}, which is above the typical range.
overweight.body: This means your weight is slightly higher than recommended for your height. We will use your BMI to create a personalized weight-loss plan.

obese.title: Your BMI is {{bmi}}, which is well above the typical range.
obese.body: Losing some weight could bring meaningful benefits to your health and energy levels. We will use your BMI to build your personalized programme.

templates.health_benefit_target: Research shows losing 10% or more of body weight can lower risk of several weight-related health issues.
templates.ambitious_goal_target: People with excess weight who lose more than 20% are significantly more likely to achieve healthy metabolic markers.

infoBlocks.title: Your age helps us tailor your programme.
body: With age, metabolism can slow and body fat levels may increase, even at the same BMI.
